DOC.brief_summary: Dr. Brooke Hollister , Ph.D. department Social Behavioral Sciences University California , San Francisco conduct study compare two type intervention treat depression rural older adult .
DOC.brief_title: Senior Peer Alliance Rural Research On Wellness
DOC.detailed_description: If eligible participate study complete screen assessment , choose continue , randomize ( like flip coin ) receive either 12 week case management combine problem solve therapy ( CM-PST ) social worker 12 week self-guided problem solve therapy ( SG-PST ) support senior peer counselor . As part participation study participate three 1.5 hour assessment interview psychological neuropsychological functioning ( similar screening assessment ) prior first week treatment ( baseline ) , two week final session ( week 14 ) , three month final session ( week 24 ) . Additionally , participate three short assessment interview psychological functioning , conduct week 3 6 . These assessment take approximately 30-45 minute .
DOC.criteria: Residence rural Tuolumne , Calaveras , San Joaquin Stanislaus Counties ; Diagnosis : Major depression , unipolar ( SCID ascertain DSMIV criterion ) ; Severity depression : A PHQ9 > 10 24Item HDRS > 19 ; Need social service : CANE score > 2 , i.e . least one unmet need ; Psychotic depression SCIDIV , i.e. , presence delusion ; High suicide risk , i.e . intent plan attempt suicide near future ; Presence Axis I psychiatric disorder substance abuse unipolar major depression ; Axis II diagnosis antisocial personality ( SCIDP DSMIV ) ; History psychiatric disorder unipolar major depression generalize anxiety disorder ( include bipolar disorder , hypomania , dysthymia ) ; Dementia : MMSE 24 clinical diagnosis dementia DSMIV ; Acute/severe medical illness ( delirium , metastatic cancer , decompensated cardiac , liver kidney failure , stroke myocardial infarction ) 3 month prior entry ; use drug cause depression , ( steroid , reserpine , alphamethyldopa , tamoxiphen , vincristine ) ; Inability perform ADLs ( MAI : ADL subscale ) even assistance ( walk cane exclusion criterion ) Inability speak English ; Aphasia interfere communication ;
